sense.def:
A swarm of bees or other insects
je velika skupina čebel ali drugih žuželk, ki letijo skupaj.

seg.quote: The showers brought swarms of flying insects to torment them.

sense.def:
Kadar čebele ali druge žuželke
swarm
, se premikajo ali letijo v veliki skupini.

Kadar ljudje
swarm somewhere
, se hitro premikajo nekam v veliki skupini.

A swarm of people
je velika skupina ljudi, ki se hitro premikajo.

seg.quote: She left amid a swarm of photographers.

sense.def:
Kadar kraj
is swarming with people
, je tam veliko ljudi, ki hitijo naokoli.

seg.quote: The White House garden was swarming with security men.
